name: sourceinsight-scan

screenshots.caption: Locate issues in your src files
Remember to set your key-assign for jumping to src

short_description:
Your can get the HELP.DOC Here
Chinese Version:  
https://sourceforge.net/projects/siscan/files/1.0.1/SI_Scan_Help.doc/download
English Version:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/siscan/files/1.0.1/SI_Scan_Help_English.doc/download

sourceinsight-scan is a Source Insight plugin for static analysis of C/C++ code. It not only covers the features provided by other analysis tools such as cppcheck, coverity,pclint, findbugs and PMD, but also provides many benefits that others are not offering. It debugs the types of bugs that are hardly detected by the compilers and also highly reduces fixing costs. Not depending on compilers enables it to find potential quality issues efficiently (100,000 line per minute). It can find critical issues such as null pointer dereference, memory leaks, buffer overrun, and logic errors. Besides, it supports some customized needs including rule configuration, false positive labeling, path filtering and custom macros configurat
summary: a Source Insight plugin for static analysis of C/C++ code.
